By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the keeping of Bartholomew Faire, and Sturbridge Faire. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
By I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, Printed at Oxford : 1625.
Dated at end: Woodstocke the fourth day of August in the first yeare of his Maiesties raigne .. Steele notation: Christian his yeare (italic). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
